name: Found Guys VS
description:
It's back! Found Guys VS is a new and improved version of the original Found Guys. Now featuring a new very chaotic multiplayer mode up to 4 players.

Go against players locally to see who can find various items  the quickest.

Found Guys is a game where you find items in a room! Inspired by the old TV game show called Finders Keepers. Either in single player or multiplayer, can you find the the different items in 30 seconds? Let's find out!

This game was originally made for Global Game Jam 2021. And is now being submitted to the  Games Innovation Challenge.

Original Global Game Jam version: https://squidmaker.itch.io/found-guys

Controls:

Controllers like Xbox, PS4, Switch, fight stick, etc may need the downloadable Windows version!  

Move - WASD/Left Joystick

Jump - Space/South Button

Hold and Throw - Enter/Triggers

Start - 1 Key/+ Button

(You can use keyboard or controller or a fight stick.)

Credits:

Been enjoying making this expansion for this game. Multiplayer was a challenge but happy from what I achieved. I hope you all enjoy Found Guys VS!
